IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_applicants') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_applicants GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_applicants @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT a.character_id, c.nickname, c.class FROM Guild_Applicants AS a INNER JOIN Characters AS c ON a.character_id = c.id WHERE a.guild_id = @guild_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
